alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington; Northwest Blue Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 08 at 6:38PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: A band of moderate to heavy snowfall is moving across the Blue Mountains of Oregon up into Washington this evening. Overall accumulations remain on the lighter side as this band moves across, around or less than 1-2 inches, but is limiting visibilities and causing difficult travel as it lifts northwards. Some rain may mix into snowfall in the lower elevations and foothills including locations such as Walla Walla, but accumulating snowfall is unlikely due to warmer temperatures and ground conditions.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington; Northwest Blue Mountains
